wobani.component.light

Class SsboLights

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.SsboLights

  • public class SsboLights
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the Blinn-Phong light sources for the UBO.

      • computeNewLightUboIndex

        private static int computeNewLightUboIndex()
        Computes the new light source's index. It returns -1 if there is not enough space to store one more light source.
        Returns:
        the new light source's index

      • createSsboWithoutInspection

        private static void createSsboWithoutInspection()
        Creates the UBO.

      • releaseSsbo

        public static void releaseSsbo()
        Releases the UBO. After calling this mathod, you can't use the LightSources UBO and can't recreate it. Note that some renderers (like the BlinnPhongRenderer) may expect to access to the LightSources UBO (which isn't possible after calling this method).

      • removeAllLights

        private static void removeAllLights()
        Removes all light sources from the UBO.
